      • displayImg

        public void displayImg()
                throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        UPDATES IMAGE VIEW AND ALSO SAVES DATA!! Is responsible for the constant saving done in this page. It also displays the image in the ImageView and updates the values for the caption, date and tags.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • copyAlbum

        public void copyAlbum(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Callback function of the CopyAlbum button. Adds the photo object to the specified album. Checks for the legitimacy of said album.
        Parameters:
        event -

      • moveAlbum

        public void moveAlbum(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Callback function of the MoveAlbum button. Adds the photo object to the specified album and removes it from the current one. Checks for the legitimacy of said album.
        Parameters:
        event -
